      • getArrayProperties

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getArrayProperties(java.lang.String p_expression,
                                                                  boolean p_recursive)
        Returns a list of String denoting every primitively typed property of a certain bean.
        Parameters:
        p_expression - The EL expression describing the bean. The EL expression is passed without the leading "#{" and the trailing brace "}".
        p_recursive - if true, the list also contains properties of nested beans.
        Returns:
        a list of strings consisting of EL expressions without the leading "#{" and the trailing brace "}".

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getEveryProperty(java.lang.String p_expression,
                                                                boolean p_recursive)
        Returns a list of String denoting every primitively typed property of a certain bean.
        Parameters:
        p_expression - The EL expression describing the bean. The EL expression is passed without the leading "#{" and the trailing brace "}".
        p_recursive - if true, the list also contains properties of nested beans.
        Returns:
        a list of strings consisting of EL expressions without the leading "#{" and the trailing brace "}".
